ncsa.hdf.view
Interface DataObserver

All Known Subinterfaces:
ImageObserver, TableObserver, TextObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:
ImageView, TableView, TextView
public interface DataObserver

This interface describes the communication between the data viewer and other GUI components which handle user input/output operations performed on data objects.

Version:
1.3.0 1/26/2002
Author:
Peter X. Cao

          Disposes of this dataobserver.
